Name: 't Hoekje
Review Text: Great dutch snacks and fries

Name: 't Hoekje
Review Text: One of the best places I ate in Amsterdam the staff is very friendly I lived nearby and they used to give free coffee everyday just welcoming me and my brother I am really sad I couldn't say goodbye when I am leaving but definitely will pass by when I visit again greetings from Egypt ‚úåÔ∏è‚úåÔ∏è‚úåÔ∏è‚úåÔ∏è

Name: 't Hoekje
Review Text: (Translated by Google) 6.95 for the world's saddest shawarma sandwich. A heap of meat, hard pita bread, tiny bit of lettuce, a few slices of tomato and a few slices of cucumber. And then they didn't even bother to put it in the bun, sad. ‚Ä¶
